name: cloudmern-deployment
description: Deployment configuration and scripts for Cloud Cost Monitoring Solution

scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:infrastructure && npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.deploy:infrastructure: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file infrastructure/main.yaml --stack-name cloudmern-infrastructure --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.deploy:frontend: npm run build:react && npm run build:angular && npm run upload:s3 && npm run invalidate:cloudfront
